channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Woo Bulk Price Update WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Woo Bulk Price Update WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-28665|2023-03-22T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- woo%20bulk%20price%20update%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The Woo Bulk Price Update WordPress plugin, in versions < 2.2.2, is affected by a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability in the 'page' parameter to the techno_get_products action, which can only be triggered by an authenticated user.
